sentences.en: an inglorious chapter in the nation's history
sentences.cn: 这个民族历史上可耻的一页

sentences.en: He will never forget that inglorious flight when he was in the army.
sentences.cn: 他永远也不会忘记他当兵时的一次不名誉的逃亡.

sentences.en: He wouldn't have accepted such an inglorious outcome.
sentences.cn: 他本来不会接受这种不光彩的结局。

sentences.en: Prices plummeted in the A shares market, the institutional investors indeed played an inglorious role.
sentences.cn: 在暴涨暴跌的A股行情中, 机构投资者确实扮演了不光彩的角色.

sentences.en: She met across him and know that he had been living an inglorious life.
sentences.cn: 她偶遇他,知道他仍过着没没无闻的生活.

sentences.en: Some mute inglorious Milton here may rest.
sentences.cn: 某个沉默的、默默无闻的诗人可能长眠于此.

sentences.en: Some television stations, the site of King's gold stocks such cases, played an inglorious role.
sentences.cn: 一些电视台 、 网站在金股之王公司此类案件中扮演了不光彩的角色.

sentences.en: The so - called glorious experiment came to an inglorious end.
sentences.cn: 所谓辉煌的试验结果都不怎么辉煌.

sentences.en: Wielding some impressive support magics, Ezalor fights the inglorious battles for the Sentinel.
sentences.cn: 艾萨罗在不名誉的战役中施展一些让人印象深刻的辅助法术为铁卫军作战.

words.tran_cn: 可耻的；不名誉的；不体面的

trans.tran_cn: 不名誉的，不体面的，可耻的
